alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Garvin; Grady; McClain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 3:44AM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Garvin, Grady, northwestern Cleveland and western McClain Counties through 415 AM CST... At 343 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Amber to 4 miles south of Rush Springs. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southern Oklahoma City, western Norman, Moore, Chickasha, Newcastle, Blanchard, Tuttle, Lindsay, Goldsby, Rush Springs, Dibble, Washington, Cole, Alex, Verden, Amber, Bridge Creek, Norge, Bradley and Tabler. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 106 and 107. Interstate 44 between mile markers 68 and 112. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
